description.para: Constants for the various types of resrefs.

briefdescription.para: Gets the name of the currently executing script.

simplesect.para: If depth is > 0, it will return the name of the script that called this one via ExecuteScript().
The name of the currently executing script.

briefdescription.para: Gets a string that contains the ascii table.

simplesect.para: The character at index 0 is a space.
A string that contains all characters at their position (e.g. 'A' at 65).

briefdescription.para: Gets an integer hash of a string.

simplesect.para: The hashed string as an integer.
The string representation of the token value.

briefdescription.para: Convert an effect type to an itemproperty type.

parameterdescription.para: The effect to convert to an itemproperty.

simplesect.para: The converted itemproperty.

briefdescription.para: Convert an itemproperty type to an effect type.

parameterdescription.para: The itemproperty to convert to an effect.

simplesect.para: The converted effect.
A UUID string.

briefdescription.para: Strip any color codes from a string.

parameterdescription.para: The string to strip of color.

simplesect.para: The new string without any color codes.

briefdescription.para: Determines if the supplied resref exists.

simplesect.para: TRUE/FALSE
The value of the environment variable.

briefdescription.para: Gets the module real life minutes per in game hour.

simplesect.para: The minutes per hour.

briefdescription.para: Set module real life minutes per in game hour.
Encodes a string for usage in a URL.

parameterdescription.para: The string to encode for a URL.

simplesect.para: The url encoded string.

briefdescription.para: Gets the row count for a 2da.

parameterdescription.para: The 2da to check (do not include the .2da).

simplesect.para: The amount of rows in the 2da.

briefdescription.para: Get the first resref of nType.

parameterdescription.para: Lets you filter out resrefs using a regexfilter. For example: nwnx_.* gets you all scripts prefixed with nwnx_ when using the NSS resref type.
If TRUE only custom resources will be returned.

simplesect.para: The first resref found or "" if none is found.
The next resref found or "" if none is found.

briefdescription.para: Get the ticks per second of the server.

simplesect.para: Useful to dynamically detect lag and adjust behavior accordingly.
The ticks per second.

parameterdescription.para: Does not take the NWScript OBJECT_TYPE_* constants. Use NWNX_Consts_TranslateNWScriptObjectType() to get their NWNX equivalent.

simplesect.para: The last created object. On error, this returns OBJECT_INVALID.
